subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony, in just his second game back from knee troubles, played 43 minutes to help defeat the Raptors and secure the Knicks’ third consecutive season in the playoffs.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony, in just his second game back from knee troubles, played 43 minutes to help defeat the Raptors and secure the Knicks’ third consecutive season in the playoffs.
